lines.chinese: 汝好！伊叫什個？
lines.pinyin: lu2 ho2! lu2 gio3(2) mig4(8) gai5?
lines.english: Hi! What's your name?

lines.chinese: 我叫阿文。伊呢？
lines.pinyin: ua2 gio3(2) a1 bhung5. lu2 ne1 ?
lines.english: My name is A-Bhung. And you?

lines.chinese: 我叫阿花。伊是底誰？
lines.pinyin: ua2 gio3(2) a1 hua1. i1 si6(7) di7 diang1?
lines.english: My name is A-Hua. Who is she?

lines.chinese: 伊是我個阿姐。
lines.pinyin: i1 si6(7) ua2 gai5(7) a1 ze2.
lines.english: She is my older sister.

lines.chinese: 汝在底塊來？
lines.pinyin: lu2 do6(7) di7 go3(2) lai5?
lines.english: Where are you from?

lines.chinese: 俺在印尼來。汝全底塊？
lines.pinyin: nang2 do6(7) ing3(2) ni5 lai5. lu2 kia6(7) di7 go3?
lines.english: We're from Indonesia. Where do you live?

lines.chinese: 我在牛車水。汝偌當時到個？
lines.pinyin: ua2 kia6(7) do7 ghu5(7) cla1 zui2. lu2 nang7 diang1 si5 gao3 gai5?
lines.english: I live in Chinatown. When did you arrive?

lines.chinese: 俺昨日到個。
lines.pinyin: nang2 za2(1) rig8 gao3 gai5
lines.english: We arrived yesterday.

lines.chinese: 做呢會來新加坡？
lines.pinyin: zo1 ni5(7) oi6(7) lai5(7) sing1 gia1 bo1?
lines.english: Why did you come to Singapore?

lines.chinese: 因為俺來𨑨迌。
lines.pinyin: ing1 ui5(7) nang2 lai5(7) tig8 to5.
lines.english: Because we came for travel.

lines.chinese: 汝覺得只塊在生？
lines.pinyin: lu2 gag4 deg4 zi2 go3 zai6(7) sen1 ?
lines.english: How do you find this place?

lines.chinese: 我覺得只塊真雅！
lines.pinyin: ua2 gag4 deg4 zi2 go3 zing1 ngia2
lines.english: I think it's beautiful here!

lines.chinese: 哇！是汝咧？汝還記得我？
lines.pinyin: Wā! ka2(1) sī7 lu2 hā1? lu2 huan1 gi3(2) dég4 ua2 bhoi6?
lines.english: Wow! Is that you? Do you still remember me?

lines.chinese: 是阿花咧？好久無遇到了！
lines.pinyin: lu2 sī7 a1 huā5? hoh4(8) gu2(3) bho5(7) ngo6 lu2 liu2.
lines.english: Are you A-Hua? Long time no see!

lines.chinese: 誒，我是阿花，汝咧做啥物？
lines.pinyin: dīoh4(8), ua1 sī6(7) a1 huā5. lu2 zī6(6) zung5 zo3(2) muēh8?
lines.english: Yes, I’m A-Hua. How are you now?

lines.chinese: 我真好，感謝。汝呢？汝做什麼工？
lines.pinyin: gua2 jin2 hó, gám2(1) siā7. lu2 ne1? lu2 do6(7) zo3(2) mih4(8) gang1?
lines.english: I’m good, thank you. And you? What kind of work are you doing?

lines.chinese: 我做老師，還是在銀行做工無？
lines.pinyin: ua2 zī2(6) zung5 sī7 sing1 sēn1. lu2 huan1 sī6(7) do6(7) ngēng5(7) hang5 zo3(2) gang1 bho5?
lines.english: I’m a teacher now. Are you still working at the bank?

lines.chinese: 無了，我在厝內做工。
lines.pinyin: bho5 liēu2, ua2 zī2(6) zung5 do6(7) laī6 zo3(2) gang1.
lines.english: Not anymore, I work from home now.

lines.chinese: 汝好，我會使睇只個？
lines.pinyin: lu2 ho2, ua2 oi6(7) sai2(1) toin2(1) zi2(1) gai5 bhoi6?
lines.english: Hi, can I take a look at this keychain?

lines.chinese: 會使。只個罔個十銖，三個二十五銖。
lines.pinyin: oi6(7) sai2. zi2(1) gai5 zêg8(4) gai5 zab8(4) kou1, san1 gai5 ri6(7) zab8(4) ngou6(7) kou1
lines.english: Of course. One is 10 ringgit, or three for 25.

lines.chinese: 好，我愛三個。還有，只本薄若銖？
lines.pinyin: ho2, ua2 ain3 san1 gai5. huan1 i6, zi2(1) bung2(1) pou6 rioh8(4) zoi7 lui5?
lines.english: Okay, I’ll take three. Also, how much is this book?

lines.chinese: 罔本十二銖。
lines.pinyin: zêg8(4) bung2 zab8(4) ri6(7) kou1
lines.english: One is 12 ringgit.

lines.chinese: 按呢我也愛罔本薄。
lines.pinyin: an1 nei2 ua2 ia7 ain3 zêg8(4) bung2(1) pou6
lines.english: Then I’ll take one book too.

lines.chinese: 今日早早，我就合我個查某朋友約好做䟘去坵底食早頓。
lines.pinyin: gim1 rig8 za2(6) za2(3), ua2 ziu6(7) ga4 ua2 gai5(7) za1 t1 bhou2(1) pēng5(7) iu2 ioh4 ho2 zo3(2) bu5(7) ke3 bo1 doi2 ziah8(4) za2(1) deng3
lines.english: Early this morning, I had made plans with my girlfriend to go to downtown for breakfast.

lines.chinese: 伊遘着我就笑笑咧：“早啊！汝今日做咧按呢早到？”
lines.pinyin: i1 ngô6(7) dioh4 ua2 ziu6(7) cio3(2) cio3 cia3: “za2 a! lu2 gim1 rig8 zo3(2) ni5(7) an1 ne1 za2(1) gao3?”
lines.english: As soon as she saw me, she smiled and said, “Morning! How come you’re here so early today?”

lines.chinese: 我笑笑回答：“我今日早醒，定着袂使曠到！”
lines.pinyin: ua2 cio3(2) cio3 huê5 i1(7): “ua2 gim1 rig8 za2(6) cên2(3), dian7 dioh8 bhoi6(7) sai2(1) uan3(2) gao3!”
lines.english: I smiled back and replied, “I woke up early today, so of course I couldn’t be late!”

lines.chinese: 俺去了許間俺恁去個咖啡店，叫了咖啡。
lines.pinyin: nang2 ke3(2) lieu1(7) he2(1) gni1 nang2 diam7 ke3 gai5(7) go1 bi5(7) diam3. gio3(2) lieu2(1) go1 bi5,
lines.english: We went to our usual café, ordered coffee,

lines.chinese: lo-ti 還有半生熟個卵，頭食頭講話。
lines.pinyin: lo-ti huan1 u6(7) buan3(2) sén1 sêg8 gai5(7) nêng, tao5(7) ziah8 tao5(7) puêh8(4) uē7.
lines.english: ordered coffee, bread, and soft-boiled eggs, and chatted while eating.

lines.chinese: 伊咧伊只幾時做工有滴困乏，我就合佢咧：
lines.pinyin: i1 dan3 i1 zi2(1) gui2(6) si5 zo3(2) gang1 u6(7) dri4(8) gian2(3) hēg8, ua2 ziu6(7) gah4 i1 dan3:
lines.english: She said she had been feeling a bit tired from work these past few days, so I told her,

lines.chinese: “勿想了，禮拜日儂會使好休息一下。”
lines.pinyin: mai3(2) siong6 lieu2, loi2(1) bai3(2) rig8 nang2 oi6(7) sai2(1) ho2(2) ho2(3) hiu1 sêg4 zêg8(4) ē7.
lines.english: “Don’t worry about it, we can rest well on Sunday.”

lines.chinese: 食好早頓後，俺去只蹛近近個花園行行，
lines.pinyin: ziah8(4) ho2(1) za2(1) deng3 ao6, nang2 ke3(2) zi2(1) go3 geng6(7) geng6 gai5(7) hue1 hng5 gian5(7) gian5,
lines.english: After breakfast, we took a walk at the nearby park,

lines.chinese: 天時真好，日頭嘛唔熱，風也真涼。
lines.pinyin: tīn si5 zing1 ho2, rig8(4) tao5 ngam1 ngam1 ho2, huang1 ia7 zing1 liang5.
lines.english: The weather was really nice — the sun was just right, and the wind was cool.

lines.chinese: 俺頭行頭講話，聯着有孥仔打球，
lines.pinyin: nang2 tao5(7) gian5 tao5(7) dan3(2) uē7, toin2(1) dioh8(4) u6(7) nou5 gian2 pah4(8) giu5,
lines.english: As we walked and talked, we saw some kids playing ball

lines.chinese: 還有一對翁姐坐在長椅曬日。
lines.pinyin: huan1 u6(7) zêg8(4) dui3 ang3 zia2 zo6(7) deng5(7) in2 pag8(4) rig8.
lines.english: and a couple sitting on a bench sunbathing.
